title: The Chilling Adventures of Sabrina Episode 2 "The Dark Baptism" Breakdown!
author: Think Story
comment: Not a spoiler, just an interesting bit of trivia: the newspaper you noticed being in Russian is actually a subtle running gag throughout the season (the language changes with each episode).
Looking at those extras and I understand why Sabrina's dad married a mortal woman

That kid that got stabbed didn’t have a black baptism but he carried a witch mark. Maybe the “you’ll lose your power” threat is just a bluff to scare the young into signing the book without resisting.
I can’t wait for you to elaborate the “Prudence Orgy” on the future episode breakdowns 😂
description:
Get ready to cast some spells because it's my new breakdown series for "The Chilling Adventures of Sabrina." This is for season one episode 2, "The Dark Baptism."

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/ThinkStoryYT
